title: Bespoke Type: know more?
content:
some of these are wonderful, especially Baro and Galaxie Ariane, very elegant takes on classics such as Eurostile and Antique Olive Nord. Does anyone know when these beautiful types will be released?

[http://bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester\_070301.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019130916/http:/bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester_070301.pdf "http://bespoketype.com/BespokeTypeByChester\_070301.pdf")

dr
author: David Rault

comments.content:
Ask Chester, chester (at) vllg (dot) com
